comments.body: I assume this means that we'll execute as many tasks as we have time for?
technically i believe what we actually do is run them until our frame callback is late...
I've added something saying the tasks should be short. I haven't said exactly how many we'll execute since this really needs to be reworked some.
this comment is great. One additional thing it should mention is whether to call resetEpoch() before or after setting timeDilation (or if it doesn't matter).
